contentrichtext.text: {{MedalTableTop|Janne Lahtela 2010.jpg|200px|Lahtela in 2010}} {{MedalCountry | {{FIN}} }} {{MedalSport | Men’s [[Freestyle skiing]]}} {{MedalOlympics}} {{MedalSport | Men's [[Freestyle skiing at the Winter Olympics|freestyle skiing]]}} {{MedalGold| [[2002 Winter Olympics|2002 Salt Lake City]] | [[Freestyle skiing at the 2002 Winter Olympics|Moguls]]}} {{MedalSilver| [[1998 Winter Olympics|1998 Nagano]] | [[Freestyle skiing at the 1998 Winter Olympics|Moguls]]}} {{MedalSport | [[FIS Freestyle World Ski Championships]]}} {{MedalGold| [[FIS Freestyle World Ski Championships 1999|1999 Meiringen-Hasliberg]]|Moguls}} {{MedalSilver| [[FIS Freestyle World Ski Championships 1999|1999 Meiringen-Hasliberg]]|Dual Moguls}} {{MedalBottom}} '''Janne Lahtela''' (born February 28, 1974 in [[Kemijärvi]]) is a [[Finns|Finnish]] former [[sportsperson|athlete]], who established himself as one of the most dominant persons in the history of [[mogul (skiing)|moguls]] skiing. He is currently the head coach of [[Japan|Japan's]] freestyle skiing team. He also is a key founder and sponsor for the IDOne ski company based out of Japan. Lahtela won a [[gold medal]] in the moguls final of [[2002 Winter Olympic Games]]. Four years earlier he had taken a silver medal in front of his cousin [[Sami Mustonen]], who took bronze. He has also won the moguls skiing World Cup five times and became a World Champion in 1999. ==External links== *[http://www.jannelahtela.com/ Official Homepage] {{Footer Olympic champions in freestyle skiing}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Lahtela, Janne | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Freestyle skier | DATE OF BIRTH = February 28, 1974 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Lahtela, Janne}} [[Category:1974 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:People from Kemijärvi]] [[Category:Finnish freestyle skiers]] [[Category:Freestyle skiers at the 1998 Winter Olympics]] [[Category:Freestyle skiers at the 2002 Winter Olympics]] [[Category:Freestyle skiers at the 2006 Winter Olympics]] [[Category:Olympic freestyle skiers of Finland]] [[Category:Olympic gold medalists for Finland]] [[Category:Olympic silver medalists for Finland]] [[Category:Olympic medalists in freestyle skiing]] [[Category:Medalists at the 2002 Winter Olympics]] [[Category:Medalists at the 1998 Winter Olympics]] {{Finland-Winter-Olympic-medalist-stub}} {{freestyle-skiing-bio-stub}}
